website_summaries.verdict: Elgato's Eve Energy smart plug is a solid product, but doesn't leave enough of an impression in an already-saturated market.
pros: The Elgato Eve Energy smart plug is compact, HomeKit enabled and features one of the deeper HomeKit apps out there
cons: The $50 price tag still feels a little high for products like this, and the app lacks the intuitive user interface of its competition
Worst of all, you can't control it remotely without an Apple TV

customer_reviews.title: but I have found that the range works just fine in my 1600 sq ft house
customer_reviews.text: Bought these along with another brand. I've just about forgotten about these because THEY JUST WORK. The other brand I am constantly having to reset. I was fearful because these were Bluetooth instead of WIFI, but I have found that the range works just fine in my 1600 sq ft house. Also, I was pleased that these leave the upper outlet socket more accessible.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pait

customer_reviews.title: Eye opening to see your power usage details
customer_reviews.text: While the only practical USE for this device is to remotely turn on and off a device that can be left switched ON - like a light - it’s eye opening to shift it around to various devices to see how much power they consume over time. I have a huge plasma TV that a friend gave me when she moved, after seeing how much power it gobbled up compared to my other LED sets, even when it’s OFF but just plugged in, I decided to pull the plug on it except when the rare occasion camebup when I wanted to watch something on it. You’ll learn a lot about just how much power your household appliances use.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Eve Energy Smart Plug
customer_reviews.text: I have smart plugs that work, communicate through the internet, but I liked this one because it only works through bluetooth, locally. It is very simple to download the Eve app into you iPhone, and with the simple tap of the "icon" in your phone, the plug turns off and on. Now I know that the people who developed this smart plug grew up with and taught themselves, and became familiar how to use it, but I am having a hard time finding anything that shows how to setup or program on off triggers, how to schedule off, on to work automatically. Please...
customer_reviews.author: J. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great for monitoring energy consumption
customer_reviews.text: I had some unexplained energy bills and used this to find my fridge was consuming about 5kwh/day. Had an appliance repair company service the coils and I’m back down to about 1kwh/day usage. I had previously tried another product with a screen but it was only showing averages for a day. The eve goes back a month and I could see the constant spike
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what everyone's talk n' about
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package, plugged it in, downloaded the app, connected the lamp. Boom. It really was quite easy. It also linked all our other accessories together (ironically better than HomeKit does!) and I could even control them with little ease. Time will tell - but the easiest plug and go automation yet! Wish pricing was a little less so that I could configure my entire house.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great product and support staff who answered my question promptly
customer_reviews.text: Great product and support staff who answered my question promptly. I like that they use an Apple TV as a hub instead of a proprietary one.. Makes way more sense but does require additional purchase if you do not have one already. I do wish it would load data faster and do a few more things but hopefully Apple will allow more functionality with homekit in the near future. Took 1 star off for price... These are way to expensive, particularly the Eve Room
customer_reviews.author: j5th

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this as an indicator light to let me know if any of two exterior doors are open. It works very reliably, and as a side-bonus the Eve iPhone app is significantly more powerful and better than the native Apple iOS Home app. If there is a complaint about the product, it’s that it’s kind of bulky and has to be used on the lower socket (US) otherwise it blocks the unused socket. I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Loftus

customer_reviews.title: this product is by far the best on the market for apple Homekit
customer_reviews.text: this product is by far the best on the market for apple Homekit, it has so many features, just be patience when you are trying to pair this with your homekit (apple tv) and you should be ok, also if you are trying to pair it with your Homekit, make sure you open the apple homekit app first to pair it. I love this device, and I will definitely buy more of this thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I have one for my light and another for the tv home theater. I can use my phone with voice to activate or shut down or my HomePod. I can look up energy usage stats on each plug. Very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J. Dan

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product For Your Smart Home
customer_reviews.text: So far very happy with this item, bought it to trigger automation to turn off a camera when I am at home through Apple HomeKit. I've rarely had some trouble with automation firing but I can't say for sure if it is an Apple problem or an Eve problem. Build quality is solid and it works as designed. Haven't tried any of the "power monitoring" features of their app.
customer_reviews.author: Shockwave562

customer_reviews.title: Great Plug for HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: Best smart plug I’ve found for HomeKit. No hubs or other junk to get in the way and works reliably. I’ve got three total and the first one is well over a year old and has never given me any issues. Even if the control on iOS says updating it still responds, which is great compared to others that will require an unplug/plugin in that state.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Impressive product when used standalone or with Apple HomeKit+Apple TV
customer_reviews.text: Adding to HomeKit was easy, it seemed to automatically pair to any Apple TV on the HomeKit AppleID via Bluetooth, which is great if you want to minimize IP devices utilized by home automation. Response time is impressive. For a while I had this switch on/off my vacuum charger upon sunrise/sunset to eliminate annoying LED flashing at night. Could also be useful for measuring appliance wattage, or switching off a coffee heater after a timer initiated by heater status. I recommend getting a right angle 3prong power dongle (make sure to get 15+amp rating) if the Eve Energy will be installed behind or under furniture.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I like that it keeps correct time
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. I like that it keeps correct time. Especially when we have power outage, change of time or things like accidental rotation of timer as happens in regular timers. This is why I too much like this timer and would buy this again. You canteen turn off and on from your cell phone. How cool is that? Like it very mucho.
customer_reviews.author: Carina C. Schuelke

customer_reviews.title: This is more like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have wrestled with Wemo products for the last few years, and got so tired of connectivity issues. I have been transitioning to Eve products, and the difference is night and day. No connection issues whatsoever with Eve, and their iPhone app is so much better. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: houtex73

customer_reviews.title: Was wondering how much electricity we consume
customer_reviews.text: To check how much our window fans were consuming, I decided to buy this unit from EVE/ELGATO to complement our HomeKit setup. Works Perfectly, and if you enter your power bill's details (cost per KWh) you can let the system calculate how much money that appliance is sucking up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sartori (fka Gaedeke)

customer_reviews.title: Great for energy monitoring
customer_reviews.text: I have Vocolinc outlets for a simple on/off function for HomeKit, but I wanted something that can allow me to monitor energy consumption for my desktop computer. It has a much better UI than Vocolinc and software updates seem much easier. Haven't had issues yet but would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Other smart plugs I tried were flakey and unreliable. This things just works. Out of the box and yup and running in less than 5 minutes. Stable connection. Energy meter is a sweet bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup and simple enough for a 9 year old with iPod touch to use
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews of similar products before purchasing this one. I've had Elgato products before, dating back to their TV tuner days so I was familiar with them as a maker of Apple product accessories. The reviews I read for this Eve Energy Switched Power Outlet were all pretty positive with many being extremely positive. Add mine to the list of extremely positive. From the setup to the daily usage, it's performed flawlessly to this point. Granted, it's only been a few days, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kevin Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great control for miscellaneous items!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, responsive and greatly appreciate the calculations by energy use. I use one for aromatherapy. It comes on just before I get home for a refreshing welcome.
customer_reviews.author: mikeg261

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works great with home kit and easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Warning - not the latest version
customer_reviews.text: While it is still a great product, be aware that this is NOT the current version. The one Eve is currently selling is smaller and the button/light is near the top edge instead of near the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does not have WiFi built in. Bluetooth only.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I researched this thing pretty well before purchase, but they really hide the fact that it does not have WiFi, only Bluetooth. So it doesn’t work further than 30 feet from my AppleTV. I needed it in another room, so... it’s useless apparently!
customer_reviews.author: Laurelhurst

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs! Love the Bluetooth for easy HomeKit connection!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Elgato Eve line of products is awesome! You don't need a Hub for HomeKit compatibility and it doesn't require wifi for use! I use this to reset my router periodically which would not be possible with a wifi version!
customer_reviews.author: Elastible

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so easy to install a snowbound caveman could do it.
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in, ran the app and it worked immediately with no problems. I can highly recommend this device, especially to Apple Homekit users. It works well and install is simple. I lie simply in the digital age, isn't that what they always promised us?
customer_reviews.author: Elder Berry

customer_reviews.title: installed very easily. We use it to turn on our water ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well so far. installed very easily. We use it to turn on our water fountain and backyard lights. My only complaint is its too big, I am using it inside a weather protected enclosure and it takes away the other socket because the enclosure is not big enough. That doesn't take away from its function though.
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeni Kovelman

customer_reviews.title: Great Control
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can complain about is the part you plug a plug into is a bit burnt from running a heater. Other than that its awesome. I also love that you can control the LED light on it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Fontana

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable: turns off by itself every few hours
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately as some others have documented the smart plug turns itself off every couple of hours and so it too unreliable to use. The app itself is great and provides some helpful information on power usage and the compatibility with HomeKit is much appreciated and works rather perfectly (even when the device turns itself off HomeKit can be used to turn it back on). The low rating however is because I bought this to use with the AC unit in my apartment and its unreliability makes it effectively useless as it never remains on over the course of a full night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for HomeKit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for HomeKit. I bought for the Christmas tree but plan on using it all year for different displays. It can take a few seconds to respond but it always does.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Setup
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to setup as the provided instructions are clear. I can now turn on and off the outside Christmas lights without having to walk to the basement floor.
customer_reviews.author: Enigma Phi

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with my HomePod
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my AppleHome pod and it works flawlessly. It took about 5 minutes to unbox/setup, and now I can have Siri turn on the lights for me from anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R.

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Attractive device, easy to setup, quick and responsive. Just what I needed to allow rebooting my wifi network from my phone using Bluetooth, since of course doing so with a wifi-based plug wouldn't work to turn it back on remotely while the network was down. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with the Eve Degree and use it for an old window air conditioner that runs nonstop. I set it up in Apple home to turn on and off based on the temperature in my daughter’s room
customer_reviews.author: Laura Smith

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: works perfect with my iPhone. use it to turn on and off my wifi since its bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the cheapest one but is the best
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, the app is simple. I didn’t have any problem like I had with the Wemo mini (terrible to set up, terrible app).
customer_reviews.author: JOSE JORGE TOLENTINO DE CASTRO JUNIOR

customer_reviews.title: Really love these.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient- you'll need an Apple TV or another device that has Bluetooth - without that, one cannot access remotely (away from home) turn item on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: First day and ALWAYS quits working after the first time...
customer_reviews.text: it's the first day I've had it and each time I've used it and then tried to use it again, it stops working. Hoemkit can't find it. Even the Eve app can't find it. I will unplug it and plug it back in, and then it will work the first time. Then 5 minutes later it stops working again....what an absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MacGregor T.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and easy
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to install the whole process took me under 10 minutes to plugging in to the wall and linking to my phone. It is great being able to see how much energy your load is caring. It works seamlessly with the Apple HomeKit
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: works really well with homekit. I have 4 in ...
customer_reviews.text: works really well with homekit. I have 4 in my house and they all function without any problems. Hold connection really well without losing it since we had them
customer_reviews.author: M. Weis

customer_reviews.title: Tree lights
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, worked great for the X-mas tree lights !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use.... I got few of them already. Still works
customer_reviews.author: Kayla L.

customer_reviews.title: The thing really works, surprise! I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: The thing really works, surprise! I use it to control a whole house fan from my iPad. I use timed on/offs several times a day. I would use more of this brand of devices, if more reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: wsach

customer_reviews.title: Great product with easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Extremely quick and easy to set up with intuitive instructions from the app. Easy to use of course. Relatively compact so does not look obtrusive. Feels like quality construction. Will buy more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Best smart plug for Apple - LOADS of usage data and the App is the best
customer_reviews.text: This smart plug is my favorite smart plug of the myriad of plugs out there. It's HomeKit compatible and renders LOADS of usage data - which, as an Engineer, I absolutely love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to use. Except on the presentation of accessories could be quite confusing if one is not experience in home controls, like the timer menu. The Timer is not intuitive. The timer should be labelled "Enabled" not just ON or OFF. And should be highlighted if its timing. The biggest concern is it is limited to 110VAC. Wish it has international voltage ratings. (ie 90 to 240 VAC like the phone chargers).
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. Everything works great and it’s not too big, so I can still use the other outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Daine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and working perfectly
customer_reviews.text: If you are under university WiFi or any non-private one, I suggest you get their products. I bought an IDevice plug which is designed to connect via WiFi. It doesn’t work in my place most probably I am using dorm WiFi. Eve’s products is based on Bluetooth. Almost plug and use. I set it up in 1 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Customer C

customer_reviews.title: Most important features stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Great except it stopped syncing automation and tracking after 10 days and didn’t let me know. Updating firmware now hopefully that will help
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth and is not China made
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. It’s not connected to HomeKit via bluetooth which is ideal from a privacy concern point. Also the product is not made in China (made in Taiwan)
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Works  great
customer_reviews.text: These Eve smart plugs work great. Easy to setup. Works with Apple iPhones and ipads only. Not android.
customer_reviews.author: charlie C.

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off randomly
customer_reviews.text: I like this device in general and I use it for a window Air Conditioning unit. However, it seems to randomly shut off sometimes which makes it terrible.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: It just works.
customer_reviews.text: Setup with Apple HomeKit is fast and easy. Works everytime and haven't had an issue with it for half a year since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Wiryan Tirtarahardja

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought eve energy for my heater. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow response time
customer_reviews.text: Can be slow to respond sometimes, can have a delay.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Lewis

customer_reviews.title: ... manages scenes from other HomeKit devices as well for easy set up for scenes
customer_reviews.text: Elgato app manages scenes from other HomeKit devices as well for easy set up for scenes.
customer_reviews.author: MDH

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly. Slightly inconvenient that it covers the second ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Slightly inconvenient that it covers the second outlet if you use the top plug. I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Charley Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much junk. They turn on and off by themselves, even after having just manually turned them on through the HomeKit app. Really unhappy with these. I thought was hoping they would work well with HomeKit but instead it's just hit or miss with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and they work perfectly. Very pleased. Before I bought these I had bought two iHome plugs. Neither of the iHome plugs would connect to my router.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Sometimes it can be a little slow with home kit, but otherwise else I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Harbour

customer_reviews.title: Good and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this from India. Works perfectly so far. Been using it for more then a month now and no issues. A converter plug would be needed if u want to use it in India. Siri, remote access, geofencing all seem to work reliably so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aanubhav Prasad

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and gives a bunch of useful information about power consumption. I'm using this with the Eve Weather Sensor to control an electrical heater in my garage. I Have a couple rules setup to turn on and off the heater to keep the temperature just above freezing. Works great and will save energy by shutting off the heater when not needed, will probably pay for itself this winter. I have an insulated garage and I'm controlling a 1500 watt electric heater.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: 110 or 220v ?
customer_reviews.text: On the specifications it says 110/220v but when the product arrived, it has printed only 110v. So I think I can’t use it in my 220v house :/ ...or yes?
customer_reviews.author: CedGrafo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect HomeKit-enabled power socket!
customer_reviews.text: An affordable HomeKit-enabled socket! If you are like me, who prefers HomeKIt over any other platforms, then this is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Arr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product works great! Would have given it 5 stars if the automation part was quicker to set.
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Apple home kit
customer_reviews.text: If you lose the apple home kit code their isn’t a way to add it back into the system without buying a new one
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: It's the best by far
customer_reviews.text: I have been using all Elgato products for a few years. The App is the key selling point! It's the best by far. The hardware is rock solid, they have not failed so far. Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paramate Rienjaroensuk

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This works great. No problems with it. I have one comment. It would be perfect if you could plug in more than one thing.
customer_reviews.author: creeperg

customer_reviews.title: Eve Turns My Lights On
customer_reviews.text: Elgato Eve light switch worked so well that I bought two more. It works with all three of my lamps even though they are over 30 years old. They work great with my Apple Home app that is connected to Apple TV or iPad. The Eve app also works well and gives you info on power consumption. I like being able to set up on/off times or just turning them on/off remotely with my iPhone. The switch still gives me room to plug in something else. The Eve unit also has a neat, attractive appearance. I am very satisfied and probably will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeView

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Great reliable HomeKit device! I've had problems with some of the other brands, so far this one has worked consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Integrates flawlessly into Apple Home. No problems as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to turn off my daughters tv when she ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to turn off my daughters tv when she fell asleep-- however this device doesn't stay connected to my wifi -- it's always dropping off line --
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best smart power switch, timer and energy consumption meter
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best smart power switch, timer and energy consumption meter. Easy to set up and use and lots of information on whatever is plugged into it.Works perfectly with Apple's HomeKit and also with Philips Hue lights. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Defective - Turns off at random
customer_reviews.text: After using the plug for 24 hours, it is very clear that this plug has a very serious problem: It turns off all by itself at random. This happened to me 6 times in one day. I wondered if this was unique to my individual unit, but after reading other reviews I realized that other people are having exactly the same problem. I had the Elgato Eve Energy connected to an air conditioner. I am returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: A Writer

customer_reviews.title: Pairing was easy, initial difficulties, but it ended up working fine.
customer_reviews.text: Pairing the Elgato Eve Energy wasn't too hard. It took a couple of tries, but the app finally asked me to scan the HomeKit code for the device. Initially, when I tried turn the power on and off, I would hear the Elgato Eve Energy click on and off, but the device connected wouldn't power on. This was the case for the Christmas tree (which is where I intended to use this product), as well as for my LCD display. Then, and for no clear reason, the Elgato Eve Energy started providing power. At the time, I had a laptop connected to it. And it has since been working with the Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: pricey, there are other products out there that are much cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Geekit

customer_reviews.title: USED not new !!
customer_reviews.text: the product I received is USED. The box was unsealed and someone has written on the manual. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RJB101

customer_reviews.title: Look to another brand for your Homekit integration
customer_reviews.text: At it's best, this switch is noticeably slow to respond. Quite often it takes several seconds to turn on or off or just never responds. My Philips Hue lights and my Lutron Caseta wall switches react immediately and reliably. Elgato needs to go back to the drawing board or to cede the market to more capable companies. Look to another brand, perhaps one using a bridge. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Too confusing
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. The Wemo switches are horrible but they provide seamless access for out of home access. The triggers and rules to setup are confusing and they don't even work. I really wanted this to work for the HomeKit with Apple but it isn't worth it. I'll stick with Alexa and Wemo.
customer_reviews.author: Addy's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Fine product if you are into Smart Home tech.
customer_reviews.text: After a more lengthy use I am revising my opinions. These are junk. If you have one or two you’ll be okay but more than that they will constant disconnect and won’t operate reliably. The idea may be a good one, but these are in practice a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Gave it 1 star because it did connect easily to my internet
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest device to figure out how to automatically turn off and on lights. Too complicated. Gave it 1 star because it did connect easily to my internet. Other than that forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony D

customer_reviews.title: Best HomeKit Outlet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these outlets for over 2 years now. Great product. Construction and build quality are top notch. The Eve app is excellent. Only thing I’d like improved is the size. You can only have one per wall outlet due to the size. Hopefully they can shrink this down in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Surviving The Burbs

product_meta.title: Eve Energy - Smart Plug & Power Meter with built-in schedules, switch a connected lamp or device on & off, voice control, no bridge necessary, Bluetooth Low Energy (Apple HomeKit)
product_meta.description: Live smarter by knowing more about the place you care about most. Eve Energy understands your energy consumption - instantly see how much energy your devices are using, and switch them on or off with a simple tap or using siri. Taking advantage of Apple's revolutionary home Kit technology, Eve offers unparalleled ease of use, advanced security, and tight integration with Siri. Eve energy connects directly to your iPhone or iPad using Bluetooth smart technology, without requiring a hub, gateway or bridge.
feature_bullets: Switch your appliances on and off with a simple tap or Siri voice command
Use built-in schedules to automatically switch devices
See how much power your connected appliances are using
HomeKit-enabled for unparalleled ease of use and advanced security
Set up easily thanks to a direct connection via Bluetooth low energy technology - no bridge or gateway required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars220 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
